headline: The Internet Never Forgets – Photos Resurface Of Lady Gaga Wearing Disney Porn Shirts
author: George Rowe
sentences: Karey Burke, head of entertainment, said that her son had told her: ‘Gen-Z is 30-40 percent queerer than other generations Mom, so Disney better get with it.’ Bob Chapek, the CEO, meanwhile, begged forgiveness from the LGBTQ community.

A Disney executive has admitted that the company is seeking to increase diversity within the company because it is good for business, as the embattled CEO apologized to the LGBTQ community ‘for not being the ally you needed me to be’.
The issue isn't if it's an official Disney shirt or not it's they are told to wear stuff like that by their handlers to further Hollyweird's agenda.
